mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer, ur_pass) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{ur_pass})
mapper.select: select * from board order by bno desc
select * from board order by bno desc limit #{page}, 10

select * from board
order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title =#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno};
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_board set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
